verse: This message came to me from the Lord:
“Son of Man, tell Tyre’s Commander-in-Chief, ‘This is what the Lord God says:
Another message came to me from the Lord, and this is what it said:
“Son of Man, start singing this lamentation for the king of Tyre. Tell him, ‘This is what the Lord God says:
Another message came to me from the Lord, who had this to say:
“Son of Man, turn your attention to Sidon and prophesy against her.
“The house of Israel will never again suffer from painful briers and sharp thorn bushes that surround them on every side, and they will learn that I am the Lord.
This is what the Lord God says:

They will live in safety in the land, building houses and planting vineyards. They’ll live in safety while I judge everyone who maligns them among those who surround them. At that time they’ll learn that I am the Lord their God.’”
